Action.Name: DlgEditField.GetProperties
Action.Description: Gets the properties of an edit field control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the edit field control whose properties you want.

Action.Name: DlgEditField.SetProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of an edit field control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the edit field control whose properties you want to set.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the edit field control properties indexed by "Enabled", "Text", "Visible", and "Multiline".
